snippet: Tickets for the Yankees’ first 13 home games were up nearly 10 percent from last year, and ratings on YES were up 38 percent. Mets’ ticket sales were up, too, but their TV ratings were down.
abstract: Tickets for New York Yankees first 13 home games are up nearly 10 percent from 2013, and ratings on YES are up 38 percent; New York Mets ticket sales are up, too, but their TV ratings are down.
lead_paragraph: Tickets for the Yankees’ first 13 home games were up nearly 10 percent from last year, and ratings on YES were up 38 percent. Mets’ ticket sales were up, too, but their TV ratings were down.

headline.main: Yankees’ Attendance and Ratings Rebound, but the Mets’ Are Mixed
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Attendance and Ratings Rebound, but the Mets’ Are Mixed
